segments.text: I am going on my first date tonight . Can you give me some suggestions about what to wear ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think you look very pretty in your polka dot purple dress with your hair piled at the rear . That makes you very graceful and mysterious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , that's a good idea . Let me try it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Remember to match it with your glittering star-shaped necklace . Very attractive on formal occasions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I look more mature in the highheel shoes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I shall wear light make-up instead of heavy . The face powder will lighten my skin color .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I were your date , I would be so charmed by you .
segments.speaker: S2
